for_sales.sales_text:
£26.100 (30.000 Euro)

24 ft Cornish Crabber Built 2006 Number 80. Maintained to very high standard throughout. All woodwork freshly varnished sept 2023. Sails in good working order. Engine YANMAR 3YM20 serviced and overhauled Sept 2023. Two batteries, fuel gauge. 220 volt circuit. Battery charger and solar panel included.

Echo Sounder, GPS plotter , VHF Radio, Autopilot. Beaching legs. Full Anchor equipment with windlass

Inside: 3 ring gas cooker and oven. 1OOL of )water ( pressured) + hot water. Cooler Various utensils. Toilet, LED lighting. Space for sleeping up to five people. The boat is in excellent condition and ready to sail.

Located Roscoff. Conveyance to UK possible.

boat.full_description: Built when the original Cornish Crabber company were having financial problems Lucy Blue was probably the only boat of her type built in 2006
boat.name: Lucy Blue
boat.short_description: A very well maintained example of a Cornish Crabber
